src:
Masih Jadi Sekjen PSSI, Ratu Tisha: Saya Pegawai Tetap Biasa
03 Nov 2019, 02:47 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSSI telah menyelesaikan Kongres Luar Biasa (KLB) di Hotel Shangri-La, Jakarta Pusat, Sabtu (2/11/2019). Kongres tersebut melahirkan pengurus baru periode 2019-2023.
Untuk posisi ketua umum (ketum) diisi oleh Mochamad Iriawan. Pria yang akrab disapa Iwan Bule itu bakal didampingi oleh dua wakil yaitu Cucu Sumantri dan Iwan Budianto.
Sementara 12 anggota komite eksekutif (exco) terpilih pada KLB tersebut adalah Dirk Soplanit, Sonhadji, Ahmad Riyadh, Pieter Tanuri, Hasani Abdul Gani, Vivin Cahyani, Yoyok Sukawi, Haruna Soemitro, Juni Rahman, Endri Erawan, Hasnuryadi Sulaiman, dan Yunus Nusi.
Lantas siapa yang mengisi posisi Sekjen PSSI?
Hingga saat ini, posisi sekjen belum berubah dan masih diemban oleh Ratu Tisha Destria. Adapun, Tisha sudah menjadi sekjen PSSI sejak Juli 2017 lalu untuk menggantikan Ade Wellington.
"Berdasarkan statuta PSSI, kontrak sekjen itu profesional. Jadi saya terikat dengan kontrak hukum dan kontrak kerja selayaknya pekerja. Apabila tak ada pemberhentian, seperti halnya karyawan biasa, apabila dipercaya kembali, pasti saya akan melanjutkan amanah ini," ujar Tisha.

Baca halaman berikutnya ya Bolaneters
text:
Still the Secretary General of PSSI, Ratu Tisha: I am a Regular Permanent Employee
Nov 3 2019, 02:47 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSSI has completed the Extraordinary Congress (KLB) at the Shangri-La Hotel, Central Jakarta, Saturday (11/02/2019). The congress gave birth to a new board of 2019-2023 period.
For the position of general chairman (ketum) filled by Mochamad Iriawan. The man who is familiarly called Iwan Bule will be accompanied by two representatives namely Cucu Sumantri and Iwan Budianto.
While the 12 executive committee members (exco) elected at the KLB were Sopk Dirlan, Sonhadji, Ahmad Riyadh, Pieter Tanuri, Hasani Abdul Gani, Vivin Cahyani, Yoyok Sukawi, Haruna Soemitro, Juni Rahman, Endri Erawan, Hasnuryadi Sulaiman, and Yunus Nusi.
So who fills the position of Secretary General of PSSI?
Until now, the secretary general's position has not changed and is still carried by Queen Tisha Destria. Meanwhile, Tisha has been the secretary general of PSSI since July 2017 to replace Ade Wellington.
"Based on the PSSI statutes, the contract of the secretary general is professional. So I am bound by legal contracts and work contracts like workers. If there is no termination, as with ordinary employees, if I am trusted again, surely I will continue this mandate," said Tisha.
